feed.title: Track Awesome Acg Updates Daily

entry.title: Awesome Acg Updates on Jan 25, 2021
entry.content:
Data Sources

  • anime-offline-database (⭐1.1k) - A JSON based offline anime database containing the most important meta data as well as cross references to various anime sites such as MAL, ANIDB, ANILIST, KITSU and more. [English]

entry.title: Awesome Acg Updates on Jan 21, 2021
entry.content:
Audio

  • 0x40-web (⭐413) - HTML5/CSS3 Canvas + Web Audio clone of the 0x40 Hues Flash. [English]
  • chiru.no - High quality ACG music streaming. [English]
  • Mikutap - Interactive music mixer with Hatsune Miku. [English]
  • moefm.sh (⭐15) - Client script for moefm radio. [中文]

Danmaku

  • ABPlayerHTML5 (⭐886) - Video Player for danmaku comments. ABPlayer in HTML5. [English/中文]
  • CommentCoreLibrary (⭐1.9k) - Javascript Live Comment (Danmaku) Engine Implementation. [English/中文]
  • Danmaku (⭐707) - High performance JavaScript danmaku engine. [English/中文]
  • danmaku2ass (⭐583) - Convert comments from Niconico/AcFun/bilibili to ASS format. [English/中文]
  • DPlayer (⭐16k) - HTML5 danmaku video player. [English/中文]

Downloaders

  • Albireo (⭐124) - Bangumi auto download and management project. It has a webclient called Deneb (⭐31). [English]
  • anilist-crawler (⭐44) - Crawl data from anilist API and store in elasticsearch. [English]
  • BooruDownloader (⭐46) - Downloader for gelbooru, danbooru and other websites that use their engines. [English]
  • CeJS (⭐3.6k) - Online novels / comics downloader. [English/中文]
  • Comic-DL (⭐603) - Command line tool to download manga and comics from various comic and manga sites. [English]
  • Danbooru Downloader (⭐417) - Downloader for Danbooru. [English]
  • DMHY (⭐471) - Easily download/auto-download torrent(s) from share.dmhy.org / acg.rip etc. sites for OS X. [中文]
  • E-Hentai-Downloader (⭐2.1k) - Download E-Hentai archive as zip file. [English]
  • gallery-dl (⭐14k) - Command-line program to download image-galleries and -collections from several image hosting sites. [English]
  • getComic (⭐196) - Download tencent comics. [中文]
  • imgbrd-grabber (⭐2.8k) - Very customizable imageboard/booru downloader with powerful filenaming features. [English]
  • JComicDownloader (⭐243) - Tool for downloading some comics and light novels from China. [中文]
  • MangaRipper (⭐198) - Download manga (Japanese Comic) from several websites for your offline viewing. [English]
  • OkanimeDownloader (⭐11) - Scrape Arabic translated anime from Okanime without any effort. [English]
  • PixivUtil (Pixiv Downloader) (⭐2.5k) - Downloader and tag manager for Pixiv. [English]
  • Pixiv Illust (⭐8) - Both a downloader and a third-party Node.js api for Pixiv. [English]
  • you-get (⭐56k) - Dumb downloader that scrapes the web. [English]

Database APIs

  • AniDB API - Official API for AniDB. [English]

Data Sources

  • Anilogia (⭐326) - Anime list database. [日本語]
  • anime-relations (⭐94) - Episode redirections for Taiga. [English]
  • animecharactersdatabase - A anime characters database. [English]
  • Animeloop - Website for animeloop-cli. [English]
  • atwiki - A wiki anime STAFF. [日本語]
  • arm-server (⭐103) - A service for mapping Anime ID's between AniList, AniDB, MAL, and Kitsu. [English]
  • Bangumi Data (⭐550) - Raw data for Japanese Anime. [中文]
  • cal.syoboi - anime bangumi timeline. [日本語]
  • Dhufufu (⭐2) - Additional API Docs for some Chinese ACG sites & Related Services (currently outdated). [中文]
  • E-HentaiCrawler (⭐388) - E-Heitai Crawler. [中文]
  • gochiusa-faces-dataset - A croped animeface dataset from 'Gochuumon wa Usagi Desuka?' [English]
  • 一言（ヒトコト） - Get random quotes from ACG. [中文]
  • hummingbird.me - Anime discovery platform. [English]
  • iakesi (⭐6) - A website collection to map anime scene to real life locations(圣地巡礼). [English]
  • nyaa (⭐3.3k) - The software behind Nyaa.si. [English]
  • NyaaPantsu (⭐1k) - Nyaa.se replacement written in golang. [English]
  • pixivpy (⭐1.9k) - Pixiv API for Python. [English/中文]
  • sakugabooru - A booru like site with anime shot clip with sakuga label. [English]
  • Seiyuu.moe (⭐19) - A webpage for searching collaborate anime works between seiyuu. [English]
  • Vocaloid Database (⭐399) - Server software used by vocadb.net. [English]

Image Board

  • aint.moe (⭐7) - Your waifu aint moe. [English]
  • animeshot2 (⭐50) - An open and searchable image repository with telegram bot integration in Node.js. [English]
  • atogatari (⭐16) - Share and discover your favorite anime characters. [English]
  • BooruSurfer2 (⭐13) - Consistent and space-efficient interface to Booru-like image boards. [English]
  • danbooru (⭐2.5k) - Taggable image board written in Rails 4 for danbooru.donmai.us. [English]
  • Hydron (⭐95) - Media tagger and organizer backend and GUI frontend. [English]
  • Hydrus (⭐2.7k) - A personal booru-style media tagger that can import files and tags from your hard drive and popular websites. [English]
  • Moebooru (⭐559) - Fork of danbooru1 that has been heavily modified. Used on yande.re , Konachan.com. [English]
  • PBooru (⭐50) - Permanent Booru is an image board web server which takes leverage of the decentralization of IPFS to distribute its content. [English]
  • szurubooru (⭐811) - Python-powered booru for small to medium communities. [English]
  • TagsTable (⭐532) - Chinese ⇔ Engish translation table for common booru tags. [中文]

Image Generation

  • animate-me (⭐225) - A miniapp to convert selfie to anime. [中文]
  • avatars.moe - Automatic avatars generator. [English]
  • chainer-DCGAN (⭐936) - Generate anime face with neural network. [日本語]
  • crypko.ai - Cryptocollectible game on anime character icons. [English]
  • DeepAA (⭐1.5k) - Make Ascii Arts by Deep Learning. [English]
  • DeepAnime - Generate Anime automatically from illust. [日本語]
  • FindTwin (⭐1) - A pick and match game by random generated avatars. [English]
  • girl_friend_factory - Anime character generator (Description on Qiita). [日本語]
  • gwern.net blog - A anime GANs guidebook. [English]
  • kemonogen (⭐122) - Kemono Friends logo generator. [日本語]
  • make.girls.moe - Create Anime Characters with A.I. [English]
  • seeprettyface dongman (⭐151) - A stylegan danbooru pretrain model with Chinese document. [中文]
  • Talking Head Anime - Talking Head Anime from a Single Image (source). [English]
  • This Anime Does Not Exist - Synthesize Your Waifu Full-body using StyleGAN2. [English]
  • This Fursona Does Not Exist - AI-generated furries in an endless scrolling grid. [English]
  • This Waifu Does Not Exist - Synthesize Your Waifu Face using StyleGAN2. [English]
  • TwinGAN (⭐718) - Unsupervised Image Translation for Human Portraits to anime. [English]
  • Waifu Labs - Synthesize Your Waifu Face Conditionally. [English]

Image Processing

  • Anime4K (⭐20k) - A High-Quality Real Time Anime Upscaler. [English]
  • animeloop-cli (⭐98) - Automatically detect and cut anime loops. [English]
  • cgCompress (⭐16) - Compression tool tailored for Visual Novel CGs. [English]
  • DeepCreamPy - Decensoring hentai with deep neural networks. [English]
  • hoshizora - Merge two image by alpha channel to get displayed respectively on white/black background. [English]
  • MangaCraft (⭐707) - Semi-automatic manga colorization. [English]
  • mangaEditor - Edit manga and translate it online. [中文]
  • Overmix (⭐206) - Automatic anime screenshot stitching in high quality. [English]
  • PaintsChainer (⭐3.8k) - Line drawing colorization using chainer. [English]
  • sketchKeras (⭐465) - An u-net with some algorithm to take sketch from paints. [English]
  • style2paints (⭐18k) - Paint line images with AI. [English]
  • TachibanaYoshino AnimeGAN (⭐4.6k) - shinkaimakoto mentioned "shinkaimakoto" animestyle transfer model [English]
  • upscale.wiki.anime - Image Super-Resolution model wiki [English]
  • waifu2x (⭐28k) - Image Super-Resolution for Anime-Style Art. [English]
  • waifu2x-converter-cpp (⭐319) - Improved version of waifu2x. [English]

Image Recognition

  • alt-i2v (⭐35) - Alternative illustration2vec implitation of sigmoids of fully connected layer. [日本語]
  • animeface-2009 (⭐317) - Face and Landmark Detector for Anime/Manga. Similar to lbpcascade_animeface but more accurate. [English]
  • AnimeFace Search v3 - Face detection for Anime. Powered by Imager::AnimeFace and otama - CBIR Engine (⭐61). [日本語]
  • AniSeg (⭐204) - A faster-rcnn model for anime character segmentation. [English]
  • danbooru-tagger (⭐19) - auto labeling danboorulike tags for anime illustration. [English]
  • deep cascaded landmark detection (⭐246) - Anime face landmark detection by deep cascaded regression. [English]
  • Illustration2Vec (⭐675) - Semantic Vector Representation of Illustrations. [English]
  • lbpcascade_animeface (⭐1.9k) - Face detector for anime/manga using OpenCV. [English]
  • LFFD animeface (⭐68) - A fast and light-weighted anime face detection based on LFFD &mxnet. [English]
  • n_jigen_bot - Telegram bot. Identify if an image is 二次元 or 三次元. [English]
  • Osomatsu-san - Use deep learning to distinguish the characters in Osomatsu-san. [日本語]
  • transfer-learning-anime (⭐190) - Transfer learning for anime characters recognition. Powered by lbpcascade_animeface (⭐1.9k) for face detection. Available at MoeFlow. [English]

Image Reverse Search

  • ascii2d - 2D art search. [日本語]
  • Gochiusearch (⭐397) - Fast Scene Search Engine for 'Gochuumon wa Usagi Desuka?'. [日本語]
  • Image Search Options (Chrome Extension / Firefox Add-on) - Search multiple image reverse search engines. [English]
  • iqdb - Multi-service image search engine, source code here. [English]
  • SauceNAO - Reverse image search service, see database coverage here. [English]
  • saucenao.kgmi.moe - Better front-end for SauceNAO. [English]
  • WAIT: What Anime Is This? (⭐4.7k) - Anime scene search engine. Powered by liresolr (⭐180). [English]

Mobile Apps

  • Amadeus (⭐1k) - A side project that aims to replicate the Amadeus App shown in Steins;Gate 0. [English]
  • Atarashii (⭐79) - Android client for MyAnimeList. [English]
  • EhViewer (⭐9.1k) - Unofficial E-Hentai Application for Android. [中文]
  • KonaBot (⭐29) - iOS client for konachan.net. [English]
  • LNReader-Android (⭐121) - Light novel reader for android. [English]
  • NineAnimator (⭐820) - Elegant, concise, and intuitive anime discovery app for iOS. [English]

Programming

  • aaencoder (⭐42) - Convert Javascript to kaomoji(顔文字). [日本語]
  • gochiusa_lang (⭐25) - . [日本語]
  • hanabi (⭐250) - Colorful syntax highlighter inspired by kemono-friends-syntax-highlight and its friends. [English]
  • hhiro_lang (⭐5) - . [日本語]
  • kawaii-term (⭐116) - Kawaii shell terminal to relieve engineer's stress. [日本語]
  • kemono_friends_lang (⭐201) - . [日本語]
  • nyaruko_lang (⭐164) - . [日本語]
  • RADWIMPS (⭐276) - 君の then-then-then 世は Promise で Future. [日本語]
  • We-i_lang (⭐1) - . [日本語]

Subtitles

  • aeneas (⭐2.7k) - Automagically synchronize audio and text. [English]
  • ASS.js (⭐609) - JavaScript ASS subtitle format renderer. [English]
  • dialogue.moe (⭐334) - Search where a dialogue comes from. [English/中文]
  • JavascriptSubtitlesOctopus (⭐456) - Displays subtitles in .ass format and easily integrates with HTML5 videos. Supports all SSA/ASS features. [English]
  • libjass (⭐176) - Renders ASS subs in the browser. [English]
  • SubBuilder (⭐9) - Toolset to help checking and organizing bilingual subtitles (諸神字幕組). [English/中文]
  • subsearch.madsck.com - Search source of anime dialogue. [English/中文]
  • Sushi (⭐671) - Automatic subtitle shifter based on audio. [English]

Tools

  • anitomy (⭐289) - Anime video filename parser. [English]
  • arc_unpacker (⭐615) - Visual novel extracting tool in CLI. [English]
  • bgm (⭐20) - Display bangumi list in CLI. [中文]
  • Comicbook (⭐313) - Convert online comics to .epub e-book. [English]
  • getnative (⭐230) - Find the native resolution(s) of upscaled material (mostly anime). [English]
  • kuroshiro (⭐899) - Japanese language utility mainly for converting Kanji-mixed sentence to Hiragana, Katakana or Romaji with furigana and okurigana modes supported. [English]
  • OpenCC (⭐9.1k) - Project for conversion between Traditional and Simplified Chinese. [中文]
  • rankit.ikely.me - Scientific ranking of anime ratings by Rankit (⭐86). [English]
  • Shoko - Anime Collection Manager. [English]
  • Taiga (⭐2.2k) - Lightweight anime tracker for Windows. [English]
  • wikipedia_anime_graph (⭐4) - Calculate anime relevance from wikipedia. [日本語]

Web

  • acgn-stock (⭐265) - Stock market for trading waifu on PPT (Taiwan). [English/中文]
  • awesome-bangumi (⭐271) - Collection of bangumi.tv related projects. [中文]
  • Bangumi scripts (⭐313) - Collection of user scripts for bangumi.tv. [中文]
  • Deneb (⭐31) - Web client for Albireo (⭐124). [English]
  • japari-pedia (⭐56) - Chrome extension that turns Wikipedia into Japari-Library. [English]
  • KarasamaEgg (⭐5) - KarasamaEgg dynamic wallpaper for WallpaperEngine. [English]
  • Kemono Adblocker (⭐13) - Replace Advertisements with Kenomo Friends pictures using perceptual techniques. [English]
  • Moelib - Website with collections of various nijigen(二次元)-related development resources with filters and multi-language support. Inspired by awesome-acg. [English]
  • My Diary (⭐87) - MyDiary from movie 「Your Name」.[中文]
  • nKemono (⭐17) - Chrome Extension that replaces all images with Kemono Friends. [English]
  • pixi-live2d (⭐681) - Display live2D model as a sprite in pixi.js. [English]
  • WebLive2D (⭐32) - Rebuild of Cybernoids' Live2D demo for interactive systems on mobile platforms. [English]

Uncategorized

  • AnimeEffects (⭐765) - 2D Animation Tool. [English]
  • guide.encode.moe (⭐153) - A anime RIPPER manual. [English]
  • notify.moe (⭐353) - Fetches your anime "watching" list and notifies you when a new anime episode is available. [English]
